mapper.select: select n.notice_no , n.notice_title , m.user_id , n.notice_content , to_char(regist_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "regist_date" from notice n join member m on (user_no = notice_writer) order by notice_no desc

select n.notice_no , n.notice_title , m.user_id , n.notice_content , to_char(regist_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regist_date , file_no , file_path , filesystem_Name , original_Name from notice n join member m on (user_no = notice_writer) left join attachment on (ref_type = 'N' and ref_no = notice_no) where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
